Message 1336 of 4024
Let me clarify with AnnaLisa re if restrictions extend to me. Again I appreciate the cooperation and tone. I admittedly get very anxious in our
communications.
Sent:02/12/2024 at 02:49 PM
From:Christine Moyer

Subject:Re: Touch Base
Message 1337 of 4024
Totally... any chance we can do that today? Respectfully, of course, this discussion has been going on for weeks  and I'd like to start an inline
discussion tomorrow. I assure you I am NOT coming off the rails. Last week's ask of me is the way I plan to live my life from now on.
Just as an FYI below. It should be a pretty simple, straightforward turnaround for Anna Lisa.
The language provided in the restraining order (RO) specifically addresses restrictions on the "Restrained Person" regarding communication with the
"Protected Person." The terms of a restraining order are directed at the behavior of the restrained person to protect the safety and well-being of the
protected person. It does not impose reciprocal restrictions on the protected person's actions unless specified by the court in a mutual restraining
order.
